Umbraco 2FA

Umbraco 2FA is a two factor authentication solution for Umbraco 7.6+ by Offroadcode . With it you can configure your Umbraco site to utilize either Google Authenticator or an SMS provider to provide two factor authentication when logging into the Umbraco backoffice.

Setting Up Authentication

By default, Umbraco 2FA is enabled with Google Authenticator support. You can disable this through the "Google Authenticator" link in the navigation to the left.

Umbraco 2FA also supports adding your own SMS provider, although you will have to write your own code for the sending of the SMS message itself.
